home.text_base_description: Completely renovated, modern architectural wonder. This top floor, two level residence in Duboce Triangle features 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, Formal Living Room, Formal Dining Room, Open Family Room + Kitchen, Deeded Roof Deck, Landscaped Backyard, 2 Car Parking and Storage. The large chef's kitchen is outfitted with high end stainless steel appliances, Wolf induction cooktop/oven/microwave/convection steam oven, Sub Zero Refrigerator, custom cabinetry, quartz counters, custom lighting, and more. Bathrooms include european styled in-wall mounted commodes, Turkish marble, Hansgrohe fixtures, and steam shower, Additional luxury details include a modern wood and steel central staircase, white oak hardwood flooring throughout, two fireplaces, radiant heat, remote controlled skylights, in-unit laundry, top floor playroom + storage and more, . This home is the perfect blend of ultra modern style, and classic San Francisco architectural details.

home_facts.Property_Type: Flat, Top Floor, 2 Level, Luxury, Condominium
